Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{3: 'The four of you follow the planned route out of the ruins and into an area interspersed with abandoned factories.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "I already know the general situation. I'll contact you again if there are any new developments.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'The signal is unstable.', 3: '8', 4: 'We may be hard to reach right away.', 5: '8'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "There's no need to worry.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "I have some acquaintances nearby. They know my brother. If anything happens, they can lend a hand at a moment's notice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "As for you, Commandant, you'll have no problem as long as you follow my brother.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Acquaintances? You know people that can enter a Dead Zone?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "A lot of people went in with the main force this time. What's weird about knowing a few of them?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Murray', 3: "Exploring the ruins takes a lot of stamina with all the heavy protective equipment and safety terminals. That's why commandants can't operate around Dead Zones for too long.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Lee, make sure the commandant gets some rest. There's bound to be trouble. The commandant needs to be at peak performance to make sure nothing bad happens.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray smiles and says goodbye to the four of you, then terminates the call.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "We've been fighting for quite some time now. You should rest up, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: "We don't have time.", 3: '24', 4: 'I can keep going.', 5: '24'}
{3: 'Liv looks sad, but she does not say anything. So, you continue onward.'}
{3: 'With the warm afternoon sun at your backs, the remains left behind by the Red Tide emit the same peculiar gazes, surrounding you on all sides.'}
{3: 'The crumbling buildings nearby form a concrete forest reaching into the low clouds, limiting their visibility.'}
{3: 'In the shadow of the abandoned factories, there is a pile of crates of varying sizes, most of which show signs of being rummaged through.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'I wonder if those crates contain any clues.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she keeps moving, Liv examines the crates stacked on the side of the road.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "This area has already been picked clean by scavengers. I doubt there's anything of value here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Scavengers rummage for supplies, but clues will be left in their tracks.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Hey, what's this?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv runs up to the crates beside her and returns with a book.'}
{3: 'The book appears to have been hidden in the crates and its pages were specially preserved.'}
{3: 'Even then, the book has deteriorated over time. It seems like the pages will rip out with little effort.'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: "It's a book—the predecessor to e-books. I've heard that people in the Golden Age would restore e-books into physical copies that were sold for nostalgia or collection. Looks like it's one of those physical books.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'The four of you continue onward, book in hand.'}
{3: "While Lucia continues to look around, she glances at the book in Liv's hand, seemingly interested."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "What's in the book? Is it a clue?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Carefully, Liv opens the faded cover, and a white petal falls out onto her hand.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's a... pear blossom? It's been flattened. I don't know if it's real or not.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She carefully puts the petal back and reads the title of the book.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '"Cardman Rider Genesis"...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv quickly skims through it and conveys the story to the rest of you.'}
{3: 'Based on her description, the story is about the fate of a young man who uses the power of cards to shapeshift and save the Earth from aliens with the help of his companions.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "By the look of the content, there's nothing that can be used as a clue.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'At least it was an interesting read.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I feel that it's great to be able to trust and fight side-by-side with your companions. Not just in the story, but in real life as well...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Same here. I'm really glad to have met you all.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Liv nods and carefully turns the book to the last page.'}
{3: 'On the inside of the back cover, she sees a beautifully written note...'}
{3: '"Earth has been stricken with innumerable disasters, and time has washed every one of them away. Live for tomorrow, because all will pass.—To Shrek"'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Any disaster will eventually subside, so we must keep fighting. We maintain hope as we wait for a better tomorrow...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv silently recites the note as she rubs the white lining of the page with her fingertips.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, as if she notices something, she holds the book in front of her and carefully confirms her suspicions.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Hey... Looks like something's been covered up with repair glue...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She puts the book up to the sunlight, trying to see what is under the glue.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Anything?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia leans over to Liv and sees a line written in messy handwriting under the patch.'}
{3: '"Don\'t scribble those lies on a book for me! Who the heck still believes in hope on this forsaken planet?!"'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Sorry, it doesn't look like a clue.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv makes an apologetic face, then places the petal back into the book.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's okay. We just came across it anyway.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'It might not be a clue, but seems like it was cherished by its owner. Mind if I put it back?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Go ahead. It's not that far back.", 3: '76'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Liv nods, then quickly runs back to where she found it...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory286.png'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Alright, let's go. Hopefully, we can find some leads along the way.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "After all, we're likely to encounter Ascendants up ahead. It'd be nice to have some more intel.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You're right. Commandant, when you were up against the Ascendants...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The other three look over anxiously, as if not wanting to recall their so-called "vacation"...'}
{2: 'Relax, I still plan on cashing in on retirement...', 3: '87'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Save that sort of talk for when we return safely to Babylonia.', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The four of you fall into an awkward silence.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Um... I'm not sure if this counts as a clue. But...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv looks around at the surrounding area, lost in contemplation.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I've been here before...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Really? You've been here before, too?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I recall passing through here on a survey mission, but that was when I was still with Kurono.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Oh... It's been a while for me too...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is it something from your past, Liv?', 3: '101', 4: 'What happened?', 5: '101'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '(Nods) It was before I was a Construct. Back when I was a medic, I was ordered to come rescue people here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv points to the southeast.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Over there. But I'm sure it's already completely destroyed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'At the time, our retaliation forces were overwhelmed by Corrupted. Most of the soldiers were ordered to evacuate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But that would've led to even more casualties... I stayed behind to heal the wounded until the Constructs arrived...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Seems like this place has left quite an impression.', 3: '109'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It really has... It was because of that incident that I became a Construct. That has allowed me to help more people, like what I'm doing now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'And because I helped everyone, I was able to join the Gray Ravens and be with you all.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But I'm surprised Lee came here on a mission as well... What about you, Lucia? Have you been here before?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "If that's the case, then I think fate has brought us together.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'When asked this question, Lucia lets out an awkward expression.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "This place seems familiar, but I can't recall why...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Maybe you lost some of your memories when you changed frames?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "No, I already checked. Lucia's M.I.N.D. didn't suffer any memory loss, and her memory data was stable.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Lucia didn't lose any of her memories when she was transferred into the Plume frame.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Maybe it's just deja vu?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "You probably have been somewhere similar. That's why you think it looks familiar.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But I don't have any memories from a place like this.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Maybe you lost some memories before you transferred into the Plume frame?', 4: '1'}
{2: '...', 3: '128', 4: "(Think now's the time to tell her?)", 5: '128'}
{3: 'Thinking over this issue, Lucia opens her mouth hesitantly.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Well... Now that I think about it, some of my memory is a bit hazy and abnormal.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'That was with the former Gray Ravens before I met you all...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She sighs softly, unsure of how to continue.'}
{3: '...You tell Lucia about what Hassen and Asimov said before you all left.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You mean... they have hidden a memory from me?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'I can authorize you to access the memory.', 3: '137'}
{3: 'Lucia lowers her head in contemplation for a moment.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I trust your decision, Commandant, but we should prioritize the mission. Time is of the essence.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Also... I still have some things I need to confirm.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's fine, Lucia. Don't worry about whether or not you've been here with others before knowing the commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'From now on, the four of us will be on missions together.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Alright, thanks. I'm not worried about this... But you're right.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No matter what happens in the future, the Gray Ravens will always be together.', 4: '2'}
